data.message: I'm not gay, but hey, I had a gay uncle and I loved him and he was no less a person than any of us. Gays don't "choose" their lifestyle, they're born with it like you were born heterosexual.

replies.message: im with you...but people arent born gay... sorry
Really Tommy, you think you could choose to be gay? Just choose it for a day then.
So, Tommy, did you choose to be heterosexual?

@bert I've chosen to be gay for a week. Didn't like it. That doesn't mean I'm born straight, just like those of us who have shot guns but didn't like it weren't born disliking guns. We all have our preferences. @chris Just so you know, I did choose to be heterosexual.

I'm a straight christian, but that doesn't mean I hate gays either. I love them like I love everyone else. A sin is a sin, whether you're lying, or stealing, sleeping with people you're not supposed to. It's all sin. And we're all sinners. The difference is I have repented my sins, and ask to be forgiven when I do sin, and I love those who sin even if they don't repent. I speak out against homosexuality, because I care about their souls, even if they don't.

We are so glad you asked for forgiveness to an imaginary man in the sky.  Stupid cosmic justice.  I hope you enjoy your trip to heaven filled with murder's, rapist's and pedophile priest's because they all asked for forgiveness too.

no one is born into being gay, it's the hormones acting up and the devil getting to you. I don't hate gays I hate what they do but I don't hate the person. I hope all gays will become pure again and escape Satan's little trick
So you say, that people born gay has a mental illness...?
^ Satan is involved in hormonal development of humans now? You need some science in your life.
they are born gay and it has been proven
Your fulla more smoke than a Christmas turkey
f*** you stephen have fun going to hell
Not born gay?? Do you think Matthew Shepard wanted to live and end his life like this??? I very much doubt it. You don't get to choose! http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UiKBv29xvS8
